content: * hobby lobby i love this cotton worsted weight 4 is perfect for these cozies it is soft and comfortable and with so many beautiful colors and prints you ll have a hard time choosing just one these cozies only require 30-37 yards so they are a great way to use any partial skeins * these cozies will fit standard sized convenience store-type paper coffee cups if your initial chain meets the stated length * all of these cozies start with a foundation chain row - either single_crochet foundation or half_double_crochet foundation if you aren t sure about foundation starting row there are many helpful tutorials and videos available being that the starting row here are relatively short in length 7 ¾-8 this is a great project to learn and get comfortable with foundation starting row * all of these cozies can be very easily adjusted to be larger or smaller simply add or subtract a multiple of 2 to the foundation chain and proceed with the instructions using your total multiple of 2 as the total number of stitches per round
